installCommand: command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 || (curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash) && export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun" && export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && cd ../.. && bun install --bun-pm
buildCommand: export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun" && export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && cd ../.. && bunx turbo build --filter=@sunday-school/frontend
